argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rexr | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. RR* ) |
| 2 |  | #P_pnfxr | |- +oo e. RR* |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. RR -> +oo e. RR* ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ltpnf | |- ( A e. RR -> A < +oo ) |
| 5 |  | #P_snunioo | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ +oo e. RR* /\ A < +oo ) -> ( { A } u. ( A (,) +oo ) ) = ( A [,) +oo ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( A e. RR -> ( { A } u. ( A (,) +oo ) ) = ( A [,) +oo ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_snssi | |- ( A e. RR -> { A } C_ RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ovolsn | |- ( A e. RR -> ( vol* ` { A } ) = 0 ) |
| 9 |  | #P_nulmbl | |- ( ( { A } C_ RR /\ ( vol* ` { A } ) = 0 ) -> { A } e. dom vol ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( A e. RR -> { A } e. dom vol ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ioombl1 | |- ( A e. RR* -> ( A (,) +oo ) e. dom vol ) |
| 12 | 1, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A (,) +oo ) e. dom vol ) |
| 13 |  | #P_unmbl | |- ( ( { A } e. dom vol /\ ( A (,) +oo ) e. dom vol ) -> ( { A } u. ( A (,) +oo ) ) e. dom vol ) |
| 14 | 10, 12, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( A e. RR -> ( { A } u. ( A (,) +oo ) ) e. dom vol ) |
| 15 | 6, 14 | #P_eqeltrrd | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A [,) +oo ) e. dom vol ) |
